name: Boss' Pets
description:
Your Boss is mad at you so at least take care of her pets to calm the situation. Click the fullscreen button on the bottom right before playing.

Control:

  • WASD = Movement
  • Space = Jump
  • L Shift = Run
  • P = Pause

Note: Plan to make more pets that's why the title is plural but got no time so enjoy this mini version of it.

Credits:

  • Music by Jonathan So
  • Sound Effects byJDWasabi
  • UI by Karwisch and PaperHatLizard
  • Sprites by Me 😏
